channel.title: Matrix wont start!
channel.description:
OK, I ain't hosting or changing the name of Matrix so i'm not leeching. I just like the looks and loved the server. heres my prob.
My other server code: [code]@echo off @title Disturbed "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Dfile.encoding=Cp1252 -classpath bin;lib/libs.jar;lib/graphics.jar; Loader pause [/code]
Matrix's Code: [code]@echo off @title RUN MATRIX java -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -cp bin;data/libs/netty-3.5.2.Final.jar;data/libs/FileStore.jar com.rs.Launcher false false true pause[/code]
How do I transform Matrix's code to run with jre7?

item.title: Matrix wont start!
item.dc:creator: @Rexxy Rexxy
item.description:
@Rexxy wrote:

None of those codes work, and how do you fix the errors? I didn’t know there were any.

Read full topic

item.title: Matrix wont start!
item.dc:creator: @Redemtion Redemtion
item.description:
@Redemtion wrote:

@echo off @title Running Server java -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -server -Xms2048m -Xmx4096m -cp bin;data/libs/netty-3.5.2.Final.jar;data/libs/FileStore.jar com.rs.Launcher false false true pause

Read full topic

item.title: Matrix wont start!
item.dc:creator: @Fluffeh Fluffeh
item.description:
@Fluffeh wrote:

[quote=“Rexxy, post:1, topic:450732”]OK, I ain’t hosting or changing the name of Matrix so i’m not leeching. I just like the looks and loved the server. heres my prob.

My other server code: @echo off @title Disturbed "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Dfile.encoding=Cp1252 -classpath bin;lib/libs.jar;lib/graphics.jar; Loader pause

Matrix’s Code: @echo off @title RUN MATRIX java -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -cp bin;data/libs/netty-3.5.2.Final.jar;data/libs/FileStore.jar com.rs.Launcher false false true pause

How do I transform Matrix’s code to run with jre7?[/quote]

Really easy to fix, just change path.

@title RUN MATRIX "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -cp bin;data/libs/netty-3.5.2.Final.jar;data/libs/FileStore.jar com.rs.Launcher false false true pause

Read full topic

item.title: Matrix wont start!
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

[quote=“Rexxy, post:1, topic:450732”]OK, I ain’t hosting or changing the name of Matrix so i’m not leeching. I just like the looks and loved the server. heres my prob.

My other server code: @echo off @title Disturbed "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Dfile.encoding=Cp1252 -classpath bin;lib/libs.jar;lib/graphics.jar; Loader pause

Matrix’s Code: @echo off @title RUN MATRIX java -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -cp bin;data/libs/netty-3.5.2.Final.jar;data/libs/FileStore.jar com.rs.Launcher false false true pause

How do I transform Matrix’s code to run with jre7?[/quote]

Uh… I’m lost but…

Download JDK7.
Run Matrix with the run.bat it came with.
Done?

Read full topic
